channel.title: The whole [317] client
channel.description: ok first off i just started back in rsps's after 2 and 1/2 years of learning java and some c/c++ why the crap is the code so messy?! and why do people keep stealing clients and naming it theirs i found like 18 names in a client i was just looking at plus i can tell that this client was stole from jagex!

item.title: The whole [317] client
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“anitdragon13, post:5, topic:378064”]well i not sure about models
because most programs have models stored in a folder some were
just finding them is the hard part
plus i will know were after going over all of the source code[/quote]

I suggest learning how the 317 cache structure is and how it works before attempting to write your own client from scratch.

Read full topic

item.title: The whole [317] client
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Unbound, post:7, topic:378064”]can someone give me like a link to some kind of server maker or can someone help me make a new rsps server

im getting annoyed of other servers tht lagg to much :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:

anyone who can help…

plz help me[/quote]

Okay, first off… This is a topic completely un-related to that. Don’t come onto some other dude’s thread with your problems. Make a new thread for it in the CORRECT section.

As for your problem: The Best Server Ever

Read full topic

item.title: The whole [317] client
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“anitdragon13, post:3, topic:378064”]im going to make my own client
thats not a modded applet (f’en noobs)[/quote]

Easier said than done. Just taking the 317 client and playing with it (and not calling it completely yours) is easier. Though if you made your own client you’d still need Jagex’s models, cache, etc…

Read full topic

item.title: The whole [317] client
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“anitdragon13, post:1, topic:378064”]ok first off i just started back in rsps’s
after 2 and 1/2 years of learning java and some c/c++
why the crap is the code so messy?!
and
why do people keep stealing clients and naming it theirs
i found like 18 names in a client i was just looking at
plus i can tell that this client was stole from jagex![/quote]

Idiots have messy code.
People think the client is theirs because they edited like 3 things.
No duh the client is Jagex’s. It’s a RuneScape client. Only a few people have actually made their own client from scratch.

Read full topic
